item.title: Calculating median with CouchDB map/reduce
item.description: While medians are traditionally easy to calculate (sort a list of values and find the true mid-point of the set), calculating this using map/reduce functions is pretty much impossible. This method will allow you to calculate medians in CouchDB in a way that should scale well for millions of records.
